rComments: Loves to talk about herself and her accomplishments. Essay feedback wasn't very clear. I did well in the class but I just really didn't like Dr. Carr. On top of being the only professor I've had at this university that explicitly demands to be called "dr.", she always comes off as very pretentious and rude. I loved the readings, hated the class.

Prof Carr is great! Great class for 1st quarter of Freshman year. She's really cool and will introduce you to a wide range of thinking about things. The reading is interesting. The prompts can be a bit vague and sections were pretty unneccesary, but a nice end to the week. Overall cool prof, easy to get in touch with. A bit of an ego.

Dr. Carr teaches creative writing, and I benefited a lot from her perspective and teaching, but I also hated her class. She will constantly remind you that she is a poet, use phrases like, "now write this down..", require quite a bit of busy-work in class, and in general demonstrate how bossy she is.

Great teacher, I had her for core and writing 2. She teaches direct but varying techniques on how to write, so you can find what works for you. if you don't like creative writing and would rather write what your teacher wants to hear don't take it with Dr. Carr. If writing is something you want to master and enjoy then please take it with Dr. Carr.

Carr is not helpful! she will tell you what she expects, then she grades completely different. she's a poet, so she's not very straightforward at all. She assigns a lot of work, and her notes are sometimes irrelevant. i wouldn't recommend her for writ1.

I really learned a lot from Dr. Carr. She is an amazing teacher and really knows what she is talking about when it comes to writing essays. She gave a new look at creative writing. I recommend her class.

Great class! I felt my writing improved tremendously through her course. Her specific emphasis on the writing process is very clear and helpful.Fun professor, actually makes writing entertaining rather than a tedious task.
Writing 2 Sci Fi was awesome. Great materials and interesting discussions. Do recommend. :)
